s.text: Maybe the march's organizers should have held their demonstration in Washington, where the pundits live, instead of in Philadelphia.
On Face the Nation , Chairman Fred Thompson fended off Bob Schieffer's suggestion that the president might be guilty of obstructing justice.
Pat Buchanan appeared on both CNN's Late Edition and Fox News Sunday to advocate punishing China for its human-rights violations, high trade barriers, and arms sales to rogue nations such as Iran.
